summary: Wanting a break from his overzealous fans, a famous movie star hires a Hawaiian plantation owner to switch places with him for a few weeks.
cast: Eleanor Powell|Robert Young|George Burns|Gracie Allen|Rita Johnson|Clarence Kolb|Jo Ann Sayers|Ann Morriss|Willie Fung|Cliff Clark|Edward Gargan|Eddie 'Rochester' Anderson|Sig Ruman|Ruth Hussey|Kealohu Holt|Edgar Dearing|Ken Darby|Jon Dodson|Bud Linn|Rad Robinson|Andy Iona's Orchestra|Roy Atwell|Diane Cook|Bess Flowers|Russell Hicks|Andy Iona|Betty Jaynes|The King's Men|Edward LeSaint|Helen MacKellar|Melba Marshall|Douglas McPhail|James Millican|Alberto Morin|Tom Neal|William Newell|Claire Owen|The Pied Pipers|Bert Roach|Clarice Sherry|Jo Stafford|Phillip Terry|Martha Tibbetts|Laura Treadwell|William Wagner|Christina Welles
